posts.post_content: I am interested in trading for SGC graded T206's with Sovereign and American Beauty backs.  I have scans available of the cards that I have to trade.  Thanks, Bill  [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]
Could you post a list of what you currently have available to trade?

Bill

What types of grades are you looking for? I have an SGC 80 Willetts with an AB 350 no frame back that I would be willing to deal.

Let me know.

Thanks.

Scott
